author: Ashley Mowreader
title: U.S. Army Reorganizes, Closes ROTC Units at Colleges
description: Eighty-four college campuses will see changes to their Army ROTC programs, ranging from total closure to merging with a program at a neighboring institution, the U.S. Army announced late last month. Program changes will take effect in summer 2026.
